name: LSD
description: LSD is the new match 3 game with beautiful juicy anime graphics! Classic light casual gameplay in the best traditions of the genre. Explore casual match3 in company with naked anime girls It's easy to learn. Line up and win!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.5 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ Compatible Card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
